name: novelistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or is like a novel (= a long printed story about imaginary characters and events): Some parts of the documentary are novelistically intense. The main character is far less interesting novelistically than you would expect.
More examplesFewer examplesThe writers of the show have treated the plot almost novelistically.This novelistically detailed production of the play benefits from a tremendous performance in the central role.I think it's her novelistically most subtle and successful work so far.
